DOC.brief_summary: Estimation radiation dose coronary multislice compute tomography ( MSCT ) angiography daily practice international , multicenter vendor-independent trial .
DOC.brief_title: International PRospective Multicenter Study On RadiaTion Dose Estimates Of Coronary CT AngIOgraphy IN Daily Practice
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective analysis cardiac CT angiography enrol 1 month Collection 1 axial data set `` patient dose protocol '' ( include kV , mAs , CTDI , DLP , etc . ) CD Dose estimation dose/cm use method propose European Working Group Guidelines Quality Criteria CT. Assessment diagnostic , qualitative image quality per-vessel basis participate study site randomly select case primary study investigator ( approximately 5-10 % patient `` spot check '' interobserver variability image quality assessment ) Assessment image quality use quantitative parameter include image noise , signal-to-noise contrast-to-noise ratio
DOC.criteria: assessment coronary artery acute chest pain `` triple rule '' evaluation PCI ( stent ) evaluation bypass graft EP study cardiac anomaly pregnancy contraindication contrast medium
